## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcmetadataprinter">GCMetadataPrinter</a> - Emits GC metadata as assembly code.

Instances are created, managed, and owned by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a>.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/gcmetadataprinter-h">GCMetadataPrinter.h</a>.

### emitStackMaps() {#a99943c6d7832a6c4505529e573dc962f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::GCMetadataPrinter::emitStackMaps (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stackmaps">StackMaps</a> &amp; SM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a> &amp; AP)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Called when the stack maps are generated.

Return true if stack maps with a custom format are generated. Otherwise returns false and the default format will be used.
